actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the enhancement of command climate assessments in the Armed Forces in order to improve the assessment of matters in connection with military family readiness, and for other purposes.
short_title: Command Accountability for Military Family Readiness Act

summary.text:
Command Accountability for Military Family Readiness Act

This bill requires each military department to prioritize military readiness.

Specifically, each department must

 designate the command personnel who shall undergo a climate assessment that takes into account their support of military family readiness; provide training, guidance, and other information to ensure that such command personnel are equipped to encourage and support military family readiness within their unit or installation; ensure that each assessment includes the extent to which the command personnel encourage and support military family readiness; and ensure that each assessment includes surveys of the spouses of service members on matters that are relevant to military spouses, military families, and military family readiness.

titles.title: Command Accountability for Military Family Readiness Act
Command Accountability for Military Family Readiness Act

A bill to provide for the enhancement of command climate assessments in the Armed Forces in order to improve the assessment of matters in connection with military family readiness, and for other purposes.
